name: Crwn E-Commerce Clothing App
what: A React and Redux-powered e-commerce web application with Firebase authentication and Stripe payment integration, showcasing product filtering and cart management features.

name: CNN Based Covid-19 Severity Detection & its Diagnosis
what: A research-based deep learning model using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to classify COVID-19 severity from chest X-ray images for early diagnosis and triage.

name: Disney+ Clone
what: A front-end clone of Disney+ built using React and Firebase, featuring authentication, image sliders, responsive layout, and real-time content updates.

name: Road Scene Analysis using DeepLabV3+
what: A deep learning project utilizing DeepLabV3+ for semantic segmentation of road scenes, aimed at enhancing autonomous vehicle perception and smart city applications.

name: Mars Surface Feature Extraction and Classification Using Deep Learning
what: A NASA Mars dataset-based project that applies convolutional neural networks to extract and classify terrain features on Martian surfaces for automated exploration.

name: Portfolio
what: A responsive and animated developer portfolio built using React, Framer Motion, and styled-components, showcasing project highlights, research, and contact features.
